name: 陳文輝
objective:
This course is about the theory and practice of Machine Learning, including supervised learning, unsupervised learning, and reinforcement learning. We will also discuss recent applications of machine learning, such as data mining, computer vision, speech recognition, and text processing.

第一周(9/12)上課時間改至 七點開始
schedule:
1: Introduction
2: Overview of  machine learning & Industry Applications
3: Supervised learning
4: Unsupervised learning
5: Probability learning
6: Reinforcement learning
7: Deep learning 
8: Applications
scorePolicy:
50% Participation & Assignments.
25% Midterm presentation
25% Final Presentation
materials:
Pattern Recognition and Machine Learning |by Christopher Bishop, 2006
Lecture Notes
